snippet.title: Aces and Adventures - Trailer
snippet.description:
Aces and Adventures is a deck builder that uses playing cards for mana and attacks. Unlock and level up 5 characters, each with a unique library of cards, to face the evil that threatens to steal the warmth of the world across 13 story driven campaigns set in a rich, mythology-inspired world.

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/triplebtitles/aces-and-adventures
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1815570/Aces_and_Adventures/?beta=0
Discord: https://discord.gg/JFNSwsRGpA
